Reviews.Content: Perfect stay in typical Chinese hotel I stayed at this hotel for 4 nights. It's a great place to stay!If you have enaough of the amarican/european way of staying in a hotel, this is your place to stay.The staff speaks good English.The rooms are great, but make sure you get an updated one, becouse they were renovating while I was there. The old rooms were not that great. The updated rooms were $10 more expensive but it was worth the money.The breakfast is typical Chinese and tasted very good!!! But than again, you must be a fan for asian food like me.In the beasement is a great massage/pool/wellness centre. Enjoy it!
Reviews.Author: Basawake
